contents.text: Appendix B. RELAX NG Compact Schema
contents.ja: 付録B. RELAX NGコンパクトスキーマ

contents.text: This appendix is informative.
contents.ja: この付録は参考情報です。

contents.text: The Relax NG schema explicitly excludes elements in the Atom namespace that are not defined in this revision of the specification. Requirements for Atom Processors encountering such markup are given in Sections 6.2 and 6.3.
contents.ja: Relax NGスキーマは、仕様のこのリビジョンで定義されていないAtom名前空間の要素を明示的に除外します。このようなマークアップが発生したAtomプロセッサーの要件は、セクション6.2および6.3に記載されています。

contents.text:
# -*- rnc -*-
# RELAX NG Compact Syntax Grammar for the
# Atom Format Specification Version 11

namespace atom = "http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"
namespace xhtml = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
namespace s = "http://www.ascc.net/xml/schematron"
namespace local = ""
start = atomFeed | atomEntry
contents.ja: start = atomFeed | atomEntry

contents.text: # Common attributes
contents.ja: ＃共通属性

contents.text:
atomCommonAttributes =
   attribute xml:base { atomUri }?,
   attribute xml:lang { atomLanguageTag }?,
   undefinedAttribute*

# Text Constructs
   atomPlainTextConstruct =
      atomCommonAttributes,
      attribute type { "text" | "html" }?,
      text
atomXHTMLTextConstruct = atomCommonAttributes, attribute type { "xhtml" }, xhtmlDiv
contents.ja: atomXHTMLTextConstruct = atomCommonAttributes、属性タイプ{"xhtml"}、xhtmlDiv

contents.text: atomTextConstruct = atomPlainTextConstruct | atomXHTMLTextConstruct
contents.ja: atomTextConstruct = atomPlainTextConstruct | atomXHTMLTextConstruct

contents.text: # Person Construct
contents.ja: ＃人の構成

contents.text:
atomPersonConstruct =
   atomCommonAttributes,
   (element atom:name { text }
    & element atom:uri { atomUri }?
    & element atom:email { atomEmailAddress }?
    & extensionElement*)
# Date Construct
contents.ja: ＃日付構成

contents.text: atomDateConstruct = atomCommonAttributes, xsd:dateTime
contents.ja: atomDateConstruct = atomCommonAttributes、xsd：dateTime

contents.text: # atom:feed
contents.ja: ＃アトム：フィード

contents.text:
atomFeed =
   [
      s:rule [
         context = "atom:feed"
         s:assert [
            test = "atom:author or not(atom:entry[not(atom:author)])"
            "An atom:feed must have an atom:author unless all "
            ~ "of its atom:entry children have an atom:author."
         ]
      ]
   ]
   element atom:feed {
      atomCommonAttributes,
      (atomAuthor*
       & atomCategory*
       & atomContributor*
       & atomGenerator?
       & atomIcon?
       & atomId
& atomLink* & atomLogo? & atomRights? & atomSubtitle? & atomTitle & atomUpdated & extensionElement*), atomEntry* }
contents.ja: ＆atomLink *＆atomLogo？ ＆atomRights？ ＆atomSubtitle？ ＆atomTitle＆atomUpdated＆extensionElement *）、atomEntry *}

contents.text: # atom:entry
contents.ja: ＃atom：entry

contents.text:
atomEntry =
   [
      s:rule [
         context = "atom:entry"
         s:assert [
            test = "atom:link[@rel='alternate'] "
            ~ "or atom:link[not(@rel)] "
            ~ "or atom:content"
            "An atom:entry must have at least one atom:link element "
            ~ "with a rel attribute of 'alternate' "
            ~ "or an atom:content."
         ]
      ]
      s:rule [
         context = "atom:entry"
         s:assert [
            test = "atom:author or "
            ~ "../atom:author or atom:source/atom:author"
            "An atom:entry must have an atom:author "
            ~ "if its feed does not."
         ]
      ]
   ]
   element atom:entry {
      atomCommonAttributes,
      (atomAuthor*
       & atomCategory*
       & atomContent?
       & atomContributor*
       & atomId
       & atomLink*
       & atomPublished?
       & atomRights?
       & atomSource?
       & atomSummary?
       & atomTitle
& atomUpdated & extensionElement*) }
contents.ja: ＆atomUpdated＆extensionElement *）}

contents.text: # atom:content
contents.ja: ＃atom：content

contents.text:
atomOutOfLineContent =
   element atom:content {
      atomCommonAttributes,
      attribute type { atomMediaType }?,
      attribute src { atomUri },
      empty
   }

atomContent = atomInlineTextContent
 | atomInlineXHTMLContent
 | atomInlineOtherContent
 | atomOutOfLineContent
# atom:author
contents.ja: ＃atom：author

contents.text: atomAuthor = element atom:author { atomPersonConstruct }
# atom:category
contents.ja: ＃atom：category

contents.text: atomCategory = element atom:category {
contents.ja: atomCategory = element atom：category {

contents.text: atomCommonAttributes, attribute term { text }, attribute scheme { atomUri }?, attribute label { text }?, undefinedContent }
contents.ja: atomCommonAttributes、属性用語{text}、属性スキーム{atomUri} ?、属性ラベル{text} ?、 undefinedContent}

contents.text: # atom:contributor
contents.ja: ＃atom：contributor

contents.text: atomContributor = element atom:contributor { atomPersonConstruct }
# atom:generator
contents.ja: ＃atom：generator

contents.text: # atom:icon
contents.ja: ＃アトム：アイコン

contents.text: # atom:id
contents.ja: ＃atom：id

contents.text: # atom:logo
contents.ja: ＃アトム：ロゴ

contents.text: # atom:link
contents.ja: ＃アトム：リンク

contents.text:
atomLink =
      element atom:link {
         atomCommonAttributes,
         attribute href { atomUri },
         attribute rel { atomNCName | atomUri }?,
         attribute type { atomMediaType }?,
         attribute hreflang { atomLanguageTag }?,
         attribute title { text }?,
         attribute length { text }?,
         undefinedContent
      }
# atom:published
contents.ja: ＃atom：published

contents.text: atomPublished = element atom:published { atomDateConstruct }
# atom:rights
contents.ja: ＃atom：rights

contents.text: atomRights = element atom:rights { atomTextConstruct }
# atom:source
contents.ja: ＃atom：source

contents.text:
atomSource =
   element atom:source {
      atomCommonAttributes,
      (atomAuthor*
       & atomCategory*
       & atomContributor*
       & atomGenerator?
       & atomIcon?
       & atomId?
       & atomLink*
       & atomLogo?
       & atomRights?
       & atomSubtitle?
       & atomTitle?
       & atomUpdated?
       & extensionElement*)
   }
# atom:subtitle
contents.ja: ＃atom：subtitle

contents.text: atomSubtitle = element atom:subtitle { atomTextConstruct }
# atom:summary
contents.ja: ＃アトム：要約

contents.text: atomSummary = element atom:summary { atomTextConstruct }
# atom:title
contents.ja: ＃atom：title

contents.text: atomTitle = element atom:title { atomTextConstruct }

# atom:updated
   atomUpdated = element atom:updated { atomDateConstruct }
# Low-level simple types
contents.ja: ＃低レベルの単純型

contents.text: atomNCName = xsd:string { minLength = "1" pattern = "[^:]*" }

# Whatever a media type is, it contains at least one slash
atomMediaType = xsd:string { pattern = ".+/.+" }

# Unconstrained; it's not entirely clear how IRI fit into
# xsd:anyURI so let's not try to constrain it here
atomUri = text

# Whatever an email address is, it contains at least one @
atomEmailAddress = xsd:string { pattern = ".+@.+" }
# Simple Extension
contents.ja: ＃単純な拡張

contents.text: # Structured Extension
contents.ja: ＃構造化拡張

contents.text:
structuredExtensionElement =
   element * - atom:* {
      (attribute * { text }+,
         (text|anyElement)*)
    | (attribute * { text }*,
       (text?, anyElement+, (text|anyElement)*))
   }
# Other Extensibility
contents.ja: ＃その他の拡張性

contents.text: extensionElement = simpleExtensionElement | structuredExtensionElement
contents.ja: extensionElement = simpleExtensionElement | structuredExtensionElement

contents.text:
undefinedAttribute =
  attribute * - (xml:base | xml:lang | local:*) { text }
# XHTML
contents.ja: ＃XHTML

contents.text: # EOF
contents.ja: ＃EOF

contents.text: Copies of IPR disclosures made to the IETF Secretariat and any assurances of licenses to be made available, or the result of an attempt made to obtain a general license or permission for the use of such proprietary rights by implementers or users of this specification can be obtained from the IETF on-line IPR repository at http://www.ietf.org/ipr.

contents.text: The IETF invites any interested party to bring to its attention any copyrights, patents or patent applications, or other proprietary rights that may cover technology that may be required to implement this standard. Please address the information to the IETF at ietf-ipr@ietf.org.
